body_html: Interesting. So you installed the TensorFlow binary distro, which was probably built using GCC 4.x. Then compiled a custom op using GCC 5.x. Out of curiosity, could you try apt-get installing the GCC 4.x series and see if it works? If so, then I might want to bring to the attention of some other people that a binary compatibility problem exists.

body: Interesting. So you installed the TensorFlow binary distro, which was probably built using GCC 4.x. Then compiled a custom op using GCC 5.x. Out of curiosity, could you try apt-get installing the GCC 4.x series and see if it works? If so, then I might want to bring to the attention of some other people that a binary compatibility problem exists.
